com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface RendererFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RendererFactoryImpl, RendererFactoryImpl

    public interface RendererFactory
    Describes a renderer factory for a given package.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Renderer getRenderer(Class<?> clazz)
      Obtains a renderer for the given class.
      Renderer getTemplateRenderer()
      Deprecated. 
      Use WTemplate instead.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderer

        Renderer getRenderer(Class<?> clazz)
        Obtains a renderer for the given class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the WComponent class to retrieve the renderer for.
        Returns:
        the renderer for the given class, or null if there isn't a renderer in this package.

      • getTemplateRenderer

        @Deprecated
Renderer getTemplateRenderer()
        Deprecated. Use WTemplate instead.
        Obtains a renderer for the given template.
        Returns:
        a template renderer for the given template, or null if template rendering is not supported.
